name: 3D VB6 Game - FIGHT COMBAT II
short_description:
FIGHT COMBAT - Industrial Quality 3D

This game developed using Visual Basic 6 , DirectX8 and TrueVision3D.

FIGHT COMBAT features include true 3D terrain, dynamic lighting, mesh animation, sizable viewport, true 3D sound, complex physics, fighter ai and more.

System requirements: Windows 95/98/00/ME/XP/Vista, Microsoft DirectX8, Soundcard

You must have a 3D Graphic Accelerator Card and Sound card to play it.

THIS PROGRAM IS FREEWARE. ANY USE IN COMMERCIAL APPLICATIONS WITHOUT WRITTEN PERMISSION BY THE AUTHOR IS PROHIBITED.
